commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basf19d510"

diff:
"f19d510 Bug 387275, groan, still not working, so disable the test again.
diff --git a/toolkit/content/tests/chrome/Makefile.in b/toolkit/content/tests/chrome/Makefile.in
index 9f52ec4..c3902f6 100644
--- a/toolkit/content/tests/chrome/Makefile.in
+++ b/toolkit/content/tests/chrome/Makefile.in
@@ -58,12 +58,15 @@ _TEST_FILES = 	bug288254_window.xul \
 		window_popup_preventdefault_chrome.xul \
 		test_largemenu.xul \
 		window_largemenu.xul \
-		test_panel_focus.xul \
-		window_panel_focus.xul \
 		test_popup_anchor.xul \
 		window_popup_anchor.xul \
 		frame_popup_anchor.xul \
 		$(NULL)
 
+ifeq (,$(filter mac cocoa,$(MOZ_WIDGET_TOOLKIT)))
+_TEST_FILES += test_panel_focus.xul \
+               window_panel_focus.xul
+endif
+
 libs:: $(_TEST_FILES)
 	$(INSTALL) $(foreach f,$^,"$f") $(DEPTH)/_tests/testing/mochitest/chrome/$(relativesrcdir)
"
